scripts.db:create: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV api npm run db:create
scripts.db:setup: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV api npm run db:setup
scripts.db:reset: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV api npm run db:reset
scripts.db:migrate: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV api npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:revert: docker-compose run -e NODE_ENV api npm run db:revert

hooks.pre-commit: lerna run --concurrency 1 --stream lint --since HEAD --exclude-dependents && git add -A .
